--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Hydras:
> Hydras laughted devilish and said "all your skills
> are necesary and 
> always a good warrior is neceary. Come, Let's go our
> home"
> Hydras took off and started to fly towards
> predacon's base

     Myrmidon nodded once and leaped into the air to
assume his eagle altmode. From here it is easy for
Hydras to see that although Myrmidon may resemble an
eagle, at close range the mechanical nature of his
form is noticable. However despite what optic sensors
may say, standard and long range sensors continue to
pick him up as a standard eagle of large size.
Myrmidon flaps after Hydras, even though the booster
pack on his back gives evidence of probrably greater
possible speeds if he chose to use them. 

OOC: Myrmidon resembles real animals perhaps a little
better then the G1 Predacons did, and in fact he looks
much like them. (It almost looks as if he was made -
at least partially - in thier image.) His Eagle, Bull
and Lion modes are much like Divebomb, Tantrum (Minus
the tanks) and Razorclaw, and his robot mode is
something like Predaking, although modified slightly
and scaled down to size. While in animal forms he
'appears' to sensors to be just an animal of that
type, although anyone getting a close enough look
could obviously see the difference. 

Preston
(Myrmidon)
